mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID as "employeeId" ,EMPLOYEE_NAME as "employeeName" ,CERTIFICATED_EXPIRED_DATE as "certificatedExpiredDate" ,EMPLOYEE_BIRTH as "employeeBirth" ,EMPLOYEE_ADDRESS as "employeeAddress" ,HIRE_DATE as "hireDate" ,RETIRE_DATE as "retireDate" ,EMP_EMAIL as "empEmail" ,PASSWORD as "password" FROM EMP_MANAGE ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID
